items.title: What're you doing?
items.body: Come to play, anything is possible! 😀

items.title: Don't you know?
items.body: There are free times to play Balloon Triple Match every day, don't miss. 😉

items.title: Don't give up.
items.body: All things are difficult before they are easy. 🙂

items.title: If you get tired...
items.body: Learn to rest, not to quit. 💪

items.title: New levels arrived!
items.body: Do you want to challenge yourself? 😉

items.title: Are you busy now?
items.body: Lovely balloons are waiting for you to eliminate~ 👋

items.title: A secret knowledge
items.body: Matching Balloons is the best way to release stress. ❤

items.title: So many new balloons here!
items.body: Come to pass levels to unlock them! 🎨

items.title: Lots of new levels prepared for you,
Time for playing!
items.body: Which balloon do you like best?

items.title: Recently too busy?
items.body: It's time to relax and play! 🎨

items.title: Good news!
items.body: We prepared a lot of new levels for you.Come and play! 🧩

items.title: Hi, are you free now?
items.body: Your favorite balloons are ready to be matched. ❤

items.title: Ding Dong!
items.body: New rewards overflowed, come to claim it! 😉
